InboundCalls.description: Mandatory element which enables inbound calls on new instance.

OutboundCalls.description: Mandatory element which enables outbound calls on new instance.

ContactflowLogs.description: Boolean flag which enables CONTACTFLOW_LOGS on an instance.

ContactLens.description: Boolean flag which enables CONTACT_LENS on an instance.

AutoResolveBestVoices.description: Boolean flag which enables AUTO_RESOLVE_BEST_VOICES on an instance.

UseCustomTTSVoices.description: Boolean flag which enables USE_CUSTOM_TTS_VOICES on an instance.

EarlyMedia.description: Boolean flag which enables EARLY_MEDIA on an instance.

properties.name: IdentityManagementType
properties.description: Specifies the type of directory integration for new instance.

type.description: Specifies the type of directory integration for new instance.

properties.name: InstanceAlias
properties.description: Alias of the new directory created as part of new instance creation.

type.description: Alias of the new directory created as part of new instance creation.

properties.name: DirectoryId
properties.description: Existing directoryId user wants to map to the new Connect instance.

type.description: Existing directoryId user wants to map to the new Connect instance.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: An instanceId is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

type.description: An instanceId is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: An instanceArn is automatically generated on creation based on instanceId.

type.description: An instanceArn is automatically generated on creation based on instanceId.

properties.name: CreatedTime
properties.description: Timestamp of instance creation logged as part of instance creation.

type.description: Timestamp of instance creation logged as part of instance creation.

properties.name: ServiceRole
properties.description: Service linked role created as part of instance creation.

type.description: Service linked role created as part of instance creation.

properties.name: InstanceStatus
properties.description: Specifies the creation status of new instance.

type.description: Specifies the creation status of new instance.
